doctors.name: Dr. Anjali Mehta
doctors.profile: Specializes in diagnosing and treating hereditary skin disorders and improving personalized skincare treatments.

comments.comment: Dr. Mehta is amazing! She helped me treat my acne which I’ve been struggling with for years. She explained everything so clearly and the prescription worked like magic within weeks. Highly recommend Derma Care!
Satisfied with the consultation. I visited for hair fall treatment and got a clear understanding of the issue. Doctor prescribed a customized solution. Clinic was well-maintained and organized.

replies.reply: Thank you for your kind words! We’re glad you’re seeing improvement. 😊

comments.comment: Excellent Doctor, very knowledgeable and caring.
Excellent Doctor, very knowledgeable and caring.
